body: It can be great, dark story - maybe one of best KanColle doujin, but author literally destroys this 'might be good' plot by adding silly and idiotic happy end. Why? Author WHY? In rape stories can't be happy end -it's impossible. It's like Hiten's Shoukaku - happy end destroys whole plot, but when in Hiten's Shoukaku that has logical explanation that here its stupid and forced. This doujin has only one advantage - no shota. Shit. Shit. Shit.
I thought this was gonna be super depressing, but it turned out alright after all :)
